content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mister Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. Yes, I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be quite comfortable and conveniently located. As for the rental price, I'm sure we can find a fair agreement that suits both our needs. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, since the apartment is unfurnished and has a modest size of 50 square meters, I was thinking of a price around 400 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Mister Abbasi, but that is far below the market value for such an apartment in the city center. I'm looking for a price closer to 600 euros per month to reflect the prime location and the recent construction. Would you be willing to consider that amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, since the apartment is unfurnished and the city center is not the quietest place to live, I would like to propose a price of 450 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, I appreciate your offer, but 450 euros per month is still not reflective of the value of the apartment. I'm willing to negotiate, but I must insist on a price closer to my asking price of 600 euros. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 550 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer. Since the apartment is unfurnished and I would have to bring in my own furniture, I would like to propose a price of 475 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, while I appreciate your persistence, I must reiterate that the location of this apartment justifies a higher price. 475 euros per month is still not acceptable to me. I'm willing to consider 575 euros per month as a fair compromise. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Since the apartment is unfurnished, I would like to propose a price of 490 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, your offer of 490 euros per month is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not quite there. I'm willing to reduce my initial asking price to 570 euros per month. This is a final offer from me. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. Since the apartment is unfurnished and I would have to bring in my own furniture, I would like to propose a price of 500 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, your offer of 500 euros per month is very close to my final offer. However, I must maintain a profit margin that reflects the investment in this property. I'm willing to accept 565 euros per month as a final agreement. This is my last offer. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. Since the apartment is unfurnished, I would like to propose a price of 525 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mister Abbasi, your offer of 525 euros per month is closer to my final offer, but I must maintain a profit margin that reflects the investment in this property. I'm willing to accept 560 euros per month as a final agreement. This is my last offer. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 560 euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mister Abbasi! We have a deal at 560 euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
